title: "Error: there is no route defined for key home"  when scanning valid bootnode after navigating to "Scan QR" in Home
body:
### Description
[comment]: # (Feature or Bug? i.e Type: Bug)
_Type_: Bug

_Summary_: basically issue is that there is only one camera view, and if it is opened in several tabs (i.e. in 1) Home -> scan QR -> camera view with "Scan QR" is shown, in 2) Profile -> add bootnode (or mailserver) -> scan QR -> camera view with "Add bootnode" or mailserver is shown) and then if user is switching between them and scanning valid QR, it can cause an error. 

#### Expected behavior
camera views aren't mixed when switching and can scan bootnode(mailserver) normally.
If it is not possible, I would prefer to return to previous screen (i.e. to screen with mailserver data)

#### Actual behavior
![sdfsdfddf](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/4557972/55342080-3d3a9880-54a8-11e9-8614-9a370b2011fc.png)

### Reproduction
[comment]: # (Describe how we can replicate the bug step by step.)

Scenario 1:

* Open Status
* Go to Profile -> Mailservers (bootnodes)
* Tap on + -> Scan QR view to open camera. Pay attention to header ("Add mailserver" or bootnode)
* Go to home -> + (or to New chat -> scan QR)
* Tap on "Scan QR" to open camera.
* Switch to profile. On IOS instead of camera view is white screen.
![photo!UNITO-UNDERSCORE!2019-04-01 18 01 41](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/4557972/55342072-36ac2100-54a8-11e9-8144-af19875937ce.jpeg)

and header is changed from "Add mailserver" to "Scan QR"

* Scan valid mailserver (bootnode)

### Additional Information
[comment]: # (Please do your best to fill this out.)

* Status version: nightly 01/04/2019
* Operating System: Android, IOS (there is no particular issue, only white screen on switching between camera views)

#### Logs
[Status-debug-logs (4).zip](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/files/3030315/Status-debug-logs.4.zip)
